column1: Baby Barnaby's////I'm writing this review because Scott is hands down the best server around. Scott expertly runs the joint and I always know I am in the best hands when he is my server. His warm
column2: friendly demeanor is unmatched. Everyone who walks through the door is greeted by name. When things get busy
column4: personable and "with-it" Scott manages Baby Barnabys with the expertise of a ship captain.
